alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:51PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Fremont and northeastern Sweetwater Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 151 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles east of Oregon Buttes, which is also 34 miles southwest of Jeffrey City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Fremont and northeastern Sweetwater Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range
